1.content: You are (Y/N) (L/N). You're an average guy in your early twenties. Well, you were an average guy until you found out that you had the power to grow and transform people by touch. The heroes and villains have fought over you trying to recruit you to their side but you have stayed neutral to some heroes and villains dismay. Currently, you were wandering around Gotham City thinking about what to do next. All of a sudden you get a bright idea to test out your powers. But the question is who do you go to to test out your powers on? Do you go to a villain or to a super hero?
1.title: The Start

choices: Continue making your way to Bat-Girl.
13.content: As you are walking to Bat-Girl's location, you hear a strange zap sound. You look up and discover a strange glowing portal on the ground. As you step closer to investigate, all of a sudden there is a loud rumbling as all the different Marvel characters come pouring out of the portal. There are different heroes and villains that you recognize such as Spider-Man, Captain Marvel, Black-Cat and a lot of others. They shake themselves off before they all head in different directions. You stand there stunned at what you just witnessed. In your amazement, you fail to notice the portal closes and disappears. Now, you think to yourself. "Do I follow one of these heroes and villains from the Marvel Universe and test my powers on them?" You stand there thinking until you suddenly get the idea to follow one of them but who?
13.title: A strange portal appears...

15.content: As you are looking around for Cheetah, Wonder Woman's nemesis, you find that her trail leads to a park.. You look around the park you are currently in trying to find any sign of her. All of a sudden, you have the feeling that you're being watched by someone. You look around the park for any sign of Cheetah. You don't see anything until you look up into a large tree not far from you.As you look upward into the tree, you see a pair of glowing feline eyes staring right back at you. "Cheetah, I know you're up there." You nonchalantly call out to her. She then jumped out of the tree, landing in front of you. "Have you finally made up your mind on which side to join?" she questioned you. "Well, I have a plan but I prefer to stay neutral." "And what is your plan?" she asked you as her tail swished side to side. After she asked you that, you grinned to yourself as you walked up to her. "Cheetah, do you know about my power?" You said while as you stood in front of her. "No, only a few of us heroes and villains know about your power. Excluding me." You then put your hand on her shoulder. "Well Minerva, my power allows me to grow and transform people into whatever I want and anyway I want. And I all have to do is just touch them." you say with a smug grin. Cheetah eyes widened as she realizes that you just touched her. You then see a list of options that only you can see.
15.title: You find Cheetah not far from you.

151.content: As you look at the options you also realize that time is stopped when you look through the menu. 'Well, at least she can't run away now.' You think to yourself. You see many different option that you like but there are so many you have a hard time choosing. You can transform into an animal, some kind of monster or kaiju, or something else.
151.title: Transform Cheetah

1511.content: You look through all the various choices that the menu gives you until you see something that catches your attention. You see an option to transform her into a kaiju. You've always loved kaiju movies like Godzilla and Pacific Rim so picking this option was an obvious choice for you. You pressed the option making the menu let out a little *beep* noise and with the menu saying "transformation starting in 3...2...1...". When the countdown hit one the menu disappeared. Realizing that the show was about to begin you quickly made some space between you and Cheetah. Cheetah saw that you were quite a ways from her. "Why are you over there?" she asked you curiously. "Because the show is about to begin!" "What do you mean sh-" she couldn't finish her sentence as a strange and somewhat pleasurable feeling overcame her entire body. Her body began to grow as she slowly transformed. Her lithe body gained muscle and fat at an incredible rate. "Gh, What is h-happening to m-me? What am I becoming?" Minerva groaned as she looked down at her hands and saw that her claws were lengthening. Her body continued to grow and increase in size until she reached 7 feet then 10 feet then 15 feet. Some of her fur was then replace by dark screen scales as her muzzle became longer and her teeth sharpened into fangs. She began to gain weight and height until she was a 20 foot tall blob of muscle and fat. Her breasts also swelled up in size until they were ginormous to match her body. Her whole body was ripped with muscle to carry her new weight. Cheetah's changes weren't done yet. She then sprouted two large curled horn out of her head as well as a couple rows of spikes ran down her back. Her last change was that her orange eyes changed to a bright green. With her transformation complete she was now a hybrid cheetah-reptile. "GROOOOOOARR!!!" Minerva roared out as she flexed her mighty arms. You then let out a whistle at what you've done to her. "God damn! I love my power." "Minerva come pick me up." You shout out to her. She heard you and made her over to you before grabbing you and placing you on her head. "Ah another plus side to my power is that they'll never harm or kill me." You said as you laid down on your stomach and pet her head causing Cheetah to make a weird mix of a purr and hiss. "Now what do I do next?"
1511.title: Transform her into a kaiju

15113.content: Who else do you go to?
15113.title: Go to someone else

151131.content: You make the decision to go to Felicia aka Black Cat's location. You tell Cheetah to stop. You then slide down from her head down to her shoulder. You whisper into Cheetah's ear and tell her the direction you saw Felicia heading toward. With that done, you quickly grab on to her fur as Cheetah bolts for Black Cat's location. Cars, trees, bushes and the pavement were knocked loose and around as Minerva ran through the city streets. You then thought to yourself. 'Hm, I wonder what to do to Felicia? Eh, I'll figure it out when we find her.' You shrugged to yourself. It wasn't long until you saw a black and white figure running around a corner. You told Minerva to follow her. Minerva nodded as ran after Black Cat and caught up to her before grabbing her. "Hey, let me go!" she yelled as she struggled and squirmed to get out of Cheetah's grasp. You told Minerva to set Black Cat on the nearby roof. She did so and you dropped down onto the roof with Black Cat. "Who are you? And who is that?" She shouted at you. "Okay, first of all, calm down. Second of all, her name is Minerva and what happened is I used my power on her and transformed her also my name is (Y/N)." You then reach out your hand to her for her to shake. While freaked out at first and dismissing the fact you told her you transformed Cheetah. She then smiled before shaking your hand. "My name's Black Cat. Nice to meet you." You then activate your power and time freezes one again as the menu pops up again. "Now what to do?"
151131.title: Go to Black Cat

152.content: You choose the option to grow Minerva but as you press the option even more options pop up causing you to sigh. "Why are there so many options?" You scroll through the menu and find multiple options to grow her in different ways. "Hm, so many options. I don't know what to choose." You stood there in thought at all the many options in front of you. You eyes suddenly lit up at one option in particular.
152.title: Grow Cheetah

info.brief_description: You are an average guy but with the power to grow or transform people by touch.
info.description:
Rules:

1. No naming yourself, just use (Y/N) as in (Your name)

2. Keep the reader straight in this story please. No M/M.

3. Any kind of growth is accepted whether it's inflation, weight gain, expansion or GTS.

4. No gore or death please.

5. No inanimate object transformation only animal, monster or creature.

6. There can be sex between the reader/MC and one of the girls or one of the male characters in the story and one of the girls, be descriptive as you want.
info.pretty_title: Your growing and transforming DC harem!
